sections.brands.text: "Gold creates fine jewelry with just the right balance between simplicity and sophistication."
sections.callaction.title: Made in Los Angeles with love and solid gold
sections.callaction.description: “No object can tell a story quite like a piece of jewelry” - says BabyGold™ founder, Helen Ashikian. Our always-14k solid gold, fine-jewelry is sustainably made in our family-owned factory in Downtown Los Angeles, California. We cut traditional mark-ups and offer honest pricing, bringing you the highest quality pieces to love and cherish for decades to come.
